item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. How Nat Traversal Works (2020) (71 points | 12 comments)
2. Show HN: Struggle with CSS Flexbox? This Playground Is for You (76 points | 26 comments)
3. Researchers design wearable tech that can sense glucose levels more accurately (246 points | 85 comments)
4. Guten: A Tiny Newspaper Printer (149 points | 64 comments)
5. Nanoimprint Lithography Aims to Take on EUV (60 points | 32 comments)
6. Wildcard: Customize HN using a spreadsheet view (42 points | 3 comments)
7. Combining 15s interval whole-sky-camera photos to form a 4y spanning keogram (447 points | 67 comments)
8. Blur Busters Open Source Display Initiative – Refresh Cycle Shaders (55 points | 20 comments)
9. Sailor Poets Take over U.S. Navy Deck Logs on New Year's Day (21 points | discuss)
10. Refurb Weekend: Atari Stacy (44 points | 1 comment)
11. ELKS: Linux for 16-bit Intel Processors (171 points | 82 comments)
12. The Maritime Approximation (5 points | discuss)
13. Back to basics: Why we chose long-polling over websockets (25 points | 16 comments)
14. Discuo – Anonymous discussions with infinite branching and 24h lifespan (17 points | 19 comments)
15. How to draw an outline in a video game (502 points | 55 comments)
16. Myst Markdown – Markdown for technical/scientific document (83 points | 15 comments)
17. The funniest thing I ever did – a.k.a. "How To Make $100K From A Dick Joke." (72 points | 5 comments)
18. Hacker gains access to the RP2350 OTP secret by glitching the RISC-V cores (136 points | 18 comments)
19. CTO / cofounder exit deal after 1.5y at 600k revenue without SHA (21 points | 24 comments)
20. GPON FTTH networks (in)security (2016) (39 points | 10 comments)
21. The comb jelly can fuse with another (including nervous and digestive systems) (63 points | 10 comments)
22. One Dog vs. the Windows 3.1 Graphics Stack (207 points | 73 comments)
23. University of Alabama Engineer Pioneers New Process for Recycling Plastics (2024) (112 points | 103 comments)
24. It Matters Who Owns Your Copylefted Copyrights (2021) (107 points | 146 comments)
25. Hornet, RNA structure visualization method correlates sequence and 3D topology (21 points | 5 comments)
26. Labwc: Wlroots-based window-stacking compositor for Wayland, inspired by openbox (55 points | 10 comments)
27. Social Media Distorts Perceptions of Norms (49 points | 42 comments)
28. PyPI Blog: Project Quarantine (82 points | 23 comments)
29. Game dev in Rust: a year later (62 points | 27 comments)
30. Phase behavior of Cacio and Pepe sauce (362 points | 175 comments)
